sample_request.description: Sample API call to set up a todo list for photography tasks using Noki AI Engine

request_body.prompt: I need help setting up a comprehensive todo list for my photography project. I'm working on a portfolio project that includes portrait photography, landscape shots, and event photography. I need to organize my tasks, plan my shoots, and manage my post-processing workflow. Can you help me create a structured todo list with deadlines and priorities?

projects.title: Photography Portfolio 2025
projects.description: Comprehensive portfolio showcasing portrait, landscape, and event photography skills

tasks.title: Portrait Photography Session - Studio Setup
tasks.description: Conduct portrait photography session with professional lighting setup

tasks.title: Landscape Location Scouting
tasks.description: Research and visit potential landscape photography locations

tasks.title: Equipment Maintenance and Check
tasks.description: Clean lenses, check camera settings, and ensure all equipment is ready

expected_response.description: Expected response structure from the AI

response_body.text: I'll help you create a comprehensive todo list for your photography portfolio project. Based on your requirements, I've organized your tasks into logical phases with priorities and deadlines.

blocks.list_title: Photography Portfolio Project - Complete Task List

items.title: Equipment Preparation & Setup
items.description: Clean and prepare all photography equipment

items.title: Portrait Photography Session
items.description: Conduct professional portrait session with studio lighting

items.title: Landscape Location Scouting
items.description: Research and visit potential landscape photography locations

items.title: Landscape Photography Shoot
items.description: Execute landscape photography session at scouted locations

items.title: Event Photography Practice
items.description: Practice event photography techniques and timing

items.title: Portfolio Selection & Curation
items.description: Select best images and curate portfolio presentation

items.title: Final Portfolio Review
items.description: Final review and adjustments to portfolio

blocks.footer: This todo list is organized by priority and timeline. Each task builds upon the previous ones to create a comprehensive photography portfolio.

blocks.title: Photography Project Planning Guide
blocks.description: Here's a breakdown of your photography project phases and recommendations:

blocks.title: Phase 1: Preparation (Week 1)
list: Clean and test all camera equipment
Create shot list and mood boards

blocks.title: Phase 2: Photography Sessions (Weeks 2-4)
list: Portrait sessions with different lighting setups
Document all settings and techniques used

blocks.footer: Each phase builds upon the previous one, ensuring a systematic approach to your photography portfolio.

curl_example.description: Curl command to make the API call
curl_example.command:
curl -X POST 'http://localhost:8000/chat/chat' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_TOKEN' \
  -d '{
    "user_id": "photographer_001",
    "conversation_id": "conv_photography_planning_2025",
    "prompt": "I need help setting up a comprehensive todo list for my photography project. I'''m working on a portfolio project that includes portrait photography, landscape shots, and event photography. I need to organize my tasks, plan my shoots, and manage my post-processing workflow. Can you help me create a structured todo list with deadlines and priorities?",
    "projects": [
      {
        "project_id": "proj_portfolio_2025",
        "title": "Photography Portfolio 2025",
        "description": "Comprehensive portfolio showcasing portrait, landscape, and event photography skills",
        "instructor": "Self-directed"
      }
    ],
    "tasks": [
      {
        "task_id": "task_portrait_shoot_1",
        "title": "Portrait Photography Session - Studio Setup",
        "description": "Conduct portrait photography session with professional lighting setup",
        "due_datetime": "2025-01-15T14:00:00.000Z",
        "status": "not_started",
        "project_id": "proj_portfolio_2025"
      },
      {
        "task_id": "task_landscape_scouting",
        "title": "Landscape Location Scouting",
        "description": "Research and visit potential landscape photography locations",
        "due_datetime": "2025-01-20T09:00:00.000Z",
        "status": "not_started",
        "project_id": "proj_portfolio_2025"
      },
      {
        "task_id": "task_equipment_check",
        "title": "Equipment Maintenance and Check",
        "description": "Clean lenses, check camera settings, and ensure all equipment is ready",
        "due_datetime": "2025-01-10T10:00:00.000Z",
        "status": "not_started",
        "project_id": "proj_portfolio_2025"
      }
    ],
    "stage": "thinking",
    "metadata": {
      "project_type": "photography",
      "skill_level": "intermediate",
      "timeline": "3_months",
      "equipment_available": ["DSLR", "Portrait Lens", "Landscape Lens", "Tripod", "Studio Lights"]
    }
  }'

notes.authentication: Replace 'YOUR_API_TOKEN' with your actual API token. Check your environment configuration for the backend_service_token.
notes.base_url: Replace 'http://localhost:8000' with your actual server URL if different.
notes.customization: You can modify the prompt, projects, tasks, and metadata to match your specific photography needs.
notes.response_handling: The AI will return structured blocks including todo lists and explanation blocks that you can render in your UI.
notes.follow_up: After receiving the initial response, you can make follow-up calls to refine the todo list or add more specific tasks.
